thread.section_title: Optimalprint Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Optimalprint | optimalprint.com
thread.title: Emelyn Mendez

author: Emelyn Mendez
title: Emelyn Mendez
text: We used optimalprint for wedding invitations. We only needed about twenty invitations since our ceremony and reception will be very intimate. Most websites will charge you a fortune for a small amount of invitations but not optimalprint. They are of great quality and at an awesome price. Delivery was faster than expected. Have received a lot of compliments on my invitations from my guests. Definitely recommend it for any kind of invitation!
